titulo: La Fortaleza de Libertad [The Fortress of Liberty]: Master Spanish with Sci-Fi and Fantasy
descripcion:
An exciting epic fantasy novela written specifically for advanced Spanish learners—part of the Master Spanish with Sci-Fi and Fantasy series.
Are you ready to graduate beyond content made especially for language learners? Challenge yourself and level up your Spanish with this advanced-level novella!
The secret to making real progress in a language is simply to use it every day, or at least as much as possible! Using a language doesn’t necessarily mean speaking it, although that is a great way to improve. Using a language can mean speaking, writing, listening, or even reading. 
I’ve created this series to provide learners of Spanish with a fun and engaging way to spend time with the language. If you enjoy doing something, you’re more likely to do it consistently. So, if you like to listen to fantasy and sci-fi stories, you should leverage that interest in your language-learning activities! These are the books I wish I would have had when I was learning Spanish.
Take the next step in your language learning journey and level up your Spanish today!
Please note: This audiobook is in Spanish.
